When did you deploy the chute? (i.e. When did you hit spacebar to activate the stage with the chutes in it?)

> Always i used my chute with no problem. But from the last update what the H... alwys destroyed by drag and heat. drag and heat? WTH? i use heat shield and chute is in the other side why drag? why heat?

Looking at the picture, it appears that the parachute pod is still attached to the capsule and intact, so what you destroyed was the *parachute*, not the part that holds it. The parachute part looks like it's safely situated out of the airstream, but obviously the deployed parachute won't be! And since 1.0.1, parachutes don't survive being popped open at hypersonic speeds.
Because you're not pointing to retrograde, so the chute has some drag, though small. Look carefully - the big red arrow is for pod. The arrow for chute is the smaller one beside it.

Thank all for your answer.

FWIW, I leave the pressure setting on chutes alone as I don't fully understand it and it seems to work fine at the default. If I change anything about chutes, it's to slightly vary their fully open altitudes so that multiple chutes don't all open at the same time and jerk the ship apart. And I never stage chutes until the ship is doing 250m/s or less. Following these rules, I've never had any chute failures.
